subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The authorities in Wilmington, Del., pulled a body from the Delaware River yesterday, and there is a “strong likelihood” it is the missing father of Orlando Magic guard Jameer Nelson, the police said.Floyd Nelson, 57, who is an employee at a tugboat company and is known as Pete, was last seen Thursday working in a dry dock area in Chester, Pa., a suburb of Philadelphia. Divers and trained dogs searched the river Friday, but the search was suspended around 4 p.m.
